identificationModule.briefTitle: Exclusion of Venous Thrombo-Embolism With a New Clinical Decision Support
identificationModule.officialTitle: Exclusion of Venous Thrombo-Embolism With a New Clinical Decision Support With Fresh Plasma, on Any Patient With VTE Suspicion

descriptionModule.briefSummary:
The goal of this non interventional study is to demonstrate the diagnostic performances on fresh plasmas in comparison with the performances on frozen plasmas in any patients with VTE suspicion, whatever the pre-test probability. The main question it aims to answer is :

Are the performances equivalent on fresh plasmas in comparison with frozen plasmas or is it necessary to determine a new algorithm of the Clinical Decision Support with a new cut-off? Participants will be diagnosed and treated in accordance with routine standard of care.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription:
Establish the diagnostic performance of the Clinical Decision Support tool on fresh plasma, in PE and in DVT, in comparison with that on frozen plasma, and in comparison with the current diagnostic strategy, on the entire population and on the following different subpopulations:

* Patients eligible for D-dimer assay, with low or moderate clinical probability, compared to the reference diagnosis (imaging and D-Dimer adjusted and not adjusted for age)
* Patients with high clinical probability, compared to the reference diagnosis (imaging)
* Patients not eligible for D-dimer assay: either with a condition associated with increased D-dimer levels in the absence of VTE, or with a history of PE or DVT for less than 3 months or suspected thrombotic events
* Patients with known and active cancer
* Patients with COVID-19. The assays will be conducted on a fresh and frozen plasma aliquots.

bioSpec.description: Frozen plasma aliquots collected on citrated tubes

interventions.name: Routine Assays on fresh plasma
interventions.description:
Routine coagulation tests using STA-R Max analyzer :

Prothrombin Time (PT) activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT Thrombin Time (TT) Fibrinogen Anti-Xa activity

interventions.name: New Clinical Decision Support on fresh plasma
interventions.description: D-Dimer and fibrin formation assays on STA-R Max analyzer. Calculation of the exclusion score using an algorithm (manual or based on Machine Learning) compared to a Clinical Decision Support cut-off.

interventions.name: New Clinical Decision Support on frozen plasma
interventions.description: D-Dimer and fibrin formation assays on STA-R Max analyzer. Calculation of the exclusion score using an algorithm (manual or based on Machine Learning) compared to a Clinical Decision Support cut-off.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Reproducibility of the new clinical decision support with fresh plasma
primaryOutcomes.description: Reproducibility (%) calculated with 70% of the study population with fresh plasma in comparison with frozen plasma.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Threshold of the new clinical decision support with fresh plasma
primaryOutcomes.description: Threshold calculated with 70% of the study population with fresh plasma in comparison with frozen plasma.

primaryOutcomes.measure: PE / DVT sensitivity of the clinical decision support
primaryOutcomes.description: Sensitivity of the clinical decision support with fresh plasma in comparison with reference diagnosis.

primaryOutcomes.measure: PE / DVT specificity of the clinical decision support
primaryOutcomes.description: Specificity of the clinical decision support with fresh plasma in comparison with reference diagnosis.

primaryOutcomes.measure: PE / DVT likelihood ratio of the clinical decision support
primaryOutcomes.description: Likelihood ratio of the clinical decision support with fresh plasma in comparison with reference diagnosis.

primaryOutcomes.measure: PE / DVT exclusion percentage of the clinical decision support
primaryOutcomes.description: Exclusion percentage of the clinical decision support with fresh plasma in comparison with reference diagnosis.

primaryOutcomes.measure: PE / DVT negative predictive value of the clinical decision support
primaryOutcomes.description: Negative Predictive Value of the clinical decision support with fresh plasma in comparison with reference diagnosis.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* PE and/or DVT suspicion
* No opposition after informing the patient for his participation in research and processing of their data for this purpose,
* Benefiting from the social security system

Exclusion Criteria:

* Preventive or curative anticoagulant treatment, or fibrinolytic treatment,
* Legal protection (e.g. guardianship or curatorship),
* Pregnant or breastfeeding women.
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation:
* Patients eligible for D-dimer assay, with low or moderate clinical probability, compared to the reference diagnosis (imaging and D-Dimer adjusted and not adjusted for age)
* Patients with high clinical probability, compared to the reference diagnosis (imaging)
* Patients not eligible for D-dimer assay: either with a condition associated with increased D-dimer levels in the absence of VTE, or with a history of PE or DVT for less than 3 months or suspected thrombotic events
* Patients with known and active cancer
* Patients with COVID-19
